data.claim: Comprehensive Design Study Materials - 5 Topics Curated from Verified Sources
data.snippet: Design study materials covering: Glassmorphism (Glass UI, Hype4 Academy), Bento Grids (Figma Community, BentoGrids.com), Landing Pages (conversion principles from Shopify, Swipe Pages), Color Theory/Gradients (Material Design 3), Typography (Google Fonts Knowledge, Apple HIG, IxDF)
